DYAD: USA-SOMALIA

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4397 

TERRMID: MID4397 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4397 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4397 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4397 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4397 1 -- civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4397 from cm narrative and Gibler 2018, on March 2, 2008, US AC-130 gunships launched a missile attack on a suspected Al-Qaida hideout in Doblai, Somalia, killing 4 civilians. First day of dispute was on 3/2/2008 and last day of dispute was on 3/2/2008. Coded civil war MID because the US was attacking militarized rebels in Somalia. These rebels were opposed to the government and engaged in a campaign of insurgency in Somalia, per the French news agency France24. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4397 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4397 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4397 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4397 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4397
rivalry=2520 nationa=USA nationb=SOMALIA MID4397 20080302-20080302 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

On March 2, 2008, US AC-130 gunships launched a missile attack on a suspected Al-Qaida hideout in Doblai, Somalia, killing 4 civilians. First day of dispute was on 3/2/2008 and last day of dispute was on 3/2/2008.

SOURCES-CR: http://www.france24.com/en/20080303-usa-launches-missile-strike-somalia-somalia
